top_comments.comment: Also I'm a total liar, my friend Mark just reminded me that I played in a Guildball tournament a couple years ago. That was likely my first tournament, but I forgot. Sorry!
I wouldn't mind getting into this game... the Wildlings are looking especially up my alley. :D I'm loving the emphasis you're putting on the game.
I play with my siblings. For me every game is a tournament.

Tournaments are good experience 😁
I remember when we went for Underworlds tournament, in Netherlands. In my Renault Laguna...without heating during winter time 😅
Nice Video. Sometimes just go to a tournament, it's a lot of fun, important is to manage your own expectations :)

comments_since_last_sample.body: Also I'm a total liar, my friend Mark just reminded me that I played in a Guildball tournament a couple years ago. That was likely my first tournament, but I forgot. Sorry!

This is awesome, I've been a huge fan of the MESBG but no one in CT plays. Makes me wanna get into it. What are the cavalry models at 8 min in!? They look awesome and I cant find them on the webstore.

The facial hair is a great look. For real it suits you.
Lovin these videos <3
for the algorithm

First tournament was 7th Edition Killteam. I brought 23 Kroot models, so I had the largest Killteam, but they died fast. They had an infiltrate ability so I would just not deploy any models until my opponent was set up then always counter deploy. The last game was against 3 Marine bikers. It got down to his Sgt and one kroot. My opponent charged and I declared overwatch with sniper rounds. I got a 6 to hit, followed by a 6 to wound and he failed his save. My 360 no scoped a Marine on a bike. Good times.
Did you use the force on that crumb at 2:35?
unpainted mini's shame shame shame on  you
I've been painting miniatures for ten years and have never played a single game of any rule set. 😐 Seriously.
